flood.translate: наводнение, поток, потоп, половодье, затоплять, заливать, наводнять
examples: The flood took many lives.
Anger flooded him.
The sunlight flooded into the room.
The flood left them homeless.
Heavy rains flooded the valley.
The village was cut off by floods.
Japanese cars have flooded the market.
The flood subsides.
The images flooded his mind.
The flood devastated the town.
Light flooded into the room.
Our basement flooded during the heavy rains.
We have been flooded with responses to our advertisement.
The water has risen to flood level.
The swollen river flooded the village
A flood of cheap import has come into the shops.
The plain floods every spring.
The room was flooded with light.
The flood of refugees continued unabated.
We've received a flood of mail.
The rivers are close to flooding.
The flood inundated several cities.
The flood waters are slowly retreating.
Refugees flooded into the camp.
Light flooded into the kitchen.
The flood caused great hardship.
A flood inundated the whole area.
The flood level stood at three feet above usual for several weeks.
Four people drowned in the flood.
a deposit of mud left by the flood
example_translate: Эти образы заполнили все его мысли.
Наш подвал затопило во время ливней.
Мы получили поток откликов на наше объявление.
Река, вышедшая из берегов, затопила деревню.
Огромное количество дешёвого импорта наводнило магазины.
Свет ворвался в кухню. / Кухня залилась светом.
В течение нескольких недель уровень воды держался на три фута выше обычного.
Четыре человека утонули во время наводнения.
